member.name: IDWriteFontSet.FindFontFace
member.summary: Gets the index of the matching font face reference in the font set, with the same file, face index, and simulations.
member.param: Font face object that specifies the physical font.
Receives the zero-based index of the matching font if the font was found, or UINT_MAX otherwise.
Receives TRUE if the font exists or FALSE otherwise.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontSet.FindFontFaceReference
member.summary: Gets the index of the matching font face reference in the font set, with the same file, face index, and simulations.
member.param: Font face object that specifies the physical font.
Receives the zero-based index of the matching font if the font was found, or UINT_MAX otherwise.
Receives TRUE if the font exists or FALSE otherwise.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontSet.GetFontCount
member.summary: Get the number of total fonts in the set.
member.returns: Returns the number of total fonts in the set.

member.name: IDWriteFontSet.GetFontFaceReference
member.summary: Gets a reference to the font at the specified index, which may be local or remote.
member.param: Zero-based index of the font.
Receives a pointer the font face reference object, or nullptr on failure.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontSet.GetMatchingFonts
member.summary: Returns a subset of fonts filtered by the given properties.
member.param: List of properties to filter using.
The number of properties to filter.
The subset of fonts that match the properties, or nullptr on failure.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontSet.GetMatchingFonts
member.summary: Returns a subset of fonts filtered by the given properties.
member.param: The font family name.
The font weight.
The font stretch value.
The font style.
The subset of fonts that match the properties, or nullptr on failure.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontSet.GetPropertyOccurrenceCount
member.summary: Returns how many times a given property value occurs in the set.
member.param: Font property of interest.
Receives how many times the property occurs.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontSet.GetPropertyValues
member.summary: Returns the property values of a specific font item index.
member.param: Font property of interest.
Receives a pointer to the newly created localized strings object, or nullptr on failure or non-existent property.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontSet.GetPropertyValues
member.summary: Returns all unique property values in the set, which can be used for purposes such as displaying a family list or tag cloud. Values are returned in priority order according to the language list, such that if a font contains more than one localized name, then the preferred one is returned.
member.param: Font property of interest.

The preferred locale names to query as a list of semicolon-delimited names in preferred order. When a particular string (such as font family) has more than one localized name, then the first match is returned. If the first match doesn't exist, then the second match is returned, and so on. For example, "ja-jp;en-us".
Receives a pointer to the newly created localized strings object; or nullptr on failure or non-existent property.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, then it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontSet.GetPropertyValues
member.summary: Returns the property values of a specific font item index.
member.param: Zero-based index of the font.
Font property of interest.
Receives the value TRUE if the font contains the specified property identifier or FALSE if not.
Receives a pointer to the newly created localized strings object, or nullptr on failure or non-existent property.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
